question: What are the names and meanings of the different Doors of Jannah?
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
In Bukhari Shareef (chapter of fasting) names of doors of Jannah are
mentioned:
Baabus-salaat, Baabul-Jihaad, Baabul-Rayyaan, Baabul-sadaqaat

The names of the other doors are according to other Ibaadat. (Mirqaat)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
